title: ic2启动崩溃
author: 1ASKAM
txt_content:
求大佬看看怎么回事，只有一个ic2别的mod都没有
Minecraft: [02:37:39] [Client thread/ERROR] [FML]: IndustrialCraft 2 Error

Minecraft: 

Minecraft: The IC2 config file contains an invalid entry for balance/recyclerBlacklist.

Minecraft: 

Minecraft: Invalid value at line 67 (recyclerBlacklist = minecraft:glass_pane, minecraft:stick, minecraft:snowball, minecraft:snow_layer, minecraft:snow, IC2:blockScaffold).

Minecraft: 

Minecraft: There is no item matching IC2:blockScaffold.

Minecraft: [02:37:39] [Client thread/FATAL] [ic2.General]: Exception caught while showing an error.

Minecraft: java.lang.IllegalStateException: From thread Thread[Client thread,5,main]: Thread[Thread-6,5,main] already has the context current

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
你的IC2配置文件应该有问题
Minecraft: Invalid value at line 67 (recyclerBlacklist = minecraft:glass_pane, minecraft:stick, minecraft:snowball, minecraft:snow_layer, minecraft:snow, IC2:blockScaffold).
配置文件的第67行，玻璃板，木棍，雪球，雪，ic2的脚手架

replies.author: 1ASKAM
replies.txt_content: 1.11.2 1.12.2都试过了 mod版本也换过了 都是这样
